name: COLLECT YOUR ENEMY
description:
THIS GAME IS A DEMO

Please read this before playing:

Why always kill the enemy? Do you like making friends?

Come on, Let's collect our enemies!

Battle bosses and make them your friends who can give things like moves and stat buffs.

Though you still have choice to KILL, if you don't want a friend..

PLAYER...

Credits:

  • Frisk17(AKA Game_Maker46): Programming
  • LordMendin: Music https://lord-mendin.itch.io

Controls:

  • WASD Mov
  • Return/Enter to interact
  • Arrow keys for UI Navigation

PLEASE PLAY IN WINDOWED MODE

BUT IF YOU WANT TO: Press F5
